analysis.description:

	- require(bool)(users[new_user].time_removed == 0)

TrustWallet.isTransactionPending (/unique_chucks/33/0x903db1bf91cc22964cccfbe1a1875eb3b989f32a.sol#57-64) uses a dangerous strict equality:
